alert.note: Alert for Collin; Dallas; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 3:21PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Hunt, southeastern Collin and northeastern Dallas Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 320 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Addison, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dallas, Plano, Garland, McKinney, Carrollton, Richardson, Allen, Wylie, Farmers Branch, University Park, Sachse, Addison, Murphy, Fairview, Princeton, Lucas, Parker, Farmersville, Lowry Crossing and Merit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
